QuestData.Title: Collecting Dust
QuestData.Description:
If I know the Countess, which I do, her sinstone will have stronger protection than mere keys.
She is quite fond of curses to protect her gateways. I am capable of creating a residue that should protect us, but it requires the petals of a specific flower you can find in Redelav gardens.
Collect the petals of these flowers so that I may protect us from the dangers to come.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $2oa Death Lotus Petals from Death Lotuses in the Redelav District.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet the Curator outside Redelav Hall.
